title: 11/19/20 DPS-BEST OF
itunes:title: 11/19/20 DPS-BEST OF
description:
On Today's episode of the Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps last night's NBA Draft. Despite not having a high pick, were the Sixers last night's big winner? Did the Warriors consider adjusting their draft strategy after news of Klay Thompson's injury got out? We're joined by Mark Stein, NBA writer for the NY Times, and Nick Friedell, ESPN NBA Reporter covering the Warriors. Plus, what are the chances we could see Kyler Murray play baseball professionally one day? Dan and the guys discuss.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

content:encoded:
On Today's episode of the Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps last night's NBA Draft. Despite not having a high pick, were the Sixers last night's big winner? Did the Warriors consider adjusting their draft strategy after news of Klay Thompson's injury got out? We're joined by Mark Stein, NBA writer for the NY Times, and Nick Friedell, ESPN NBA Reporter covering the Warriors. Plus, what are the chances we could see Kyler Murray play baseball professionally one day? Dan and the guys discuss.
